title: Rock Climbing
description: Rock Climbing takes students on a journey into the world of climbing. Through detailed photographs and supportive text, students will learn what makes rock climbing an exciting activity as well as how to stay safe. This book can also be used to teach students how to determine fact or opinion and to understand subject-verb agreement.
meta: boulders, brave, carefully, climbing, helmet, protect
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Fact or Opinion : Determine fact or opinion
Final Consonants : Discriminate final consonant /s/ sound
Subject-Verb Agreement : Understand and apply subject-verb agreement
Suffixes : Identify and apply the suffix -s

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
